title: Lags All The Time!
body:
Since long time ago lags has started and I dont know how to fix it.

I tried to speak with riot and everything they told me didnt fixed it.(Im really thanksfull for their help).
For example, They told me to Netalyzr, its a tool that runs within your browser (other than Chrome as it needs Java) and will provide me with useful information about your network. ,They told me to run Hextech repair tool and they told me that it looks like I experiencing slow network conditions and my connection times out before reaching our servers, After this they told me to talk with my ISP but they dont see any problems and they offered me somthing to buy that might help(Its not cost that much but still...).
Im out of options ,Maybe the problem is that many people have the same ISP as me and there is load on the game I dont know... 
At the morning and at the nights I dont have lags that much but my afternoon is my playtime and I cant play because of the laggs.
By the way , Im having laggs only in LoL.

I live in israel and im playing in EUW server , My normal ms is 76-80(I would like to bring it down even more:D) And my high ms is 130-343.
If anyone have something that might help , please right it down for me I will appreciate it.
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body: Hmmmmmm it sounds like you might just be having lag during high traffic times in my opinion. When you mentioned not having much lag in the morning and night, that does sound like it could be due to heavy internet traffic during those times. I would suggest updating your port forwarding and give you DNS a flush using the steps in the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). Worth a try if you haven't yet!
